Name: Fares
About the game: Join the blue haired treasure hunter Fares in the adventure of a lifetime in this retro inspired 16-bit platformer. Discover hidden treasures and artifacts as you travel through dangerous lands of a lost civilization. Can you complete Fares collection? See if you can in this colorful and cute adventure! Key Features:- - Stunning Environments - Catchy Music - Keep track of your treasures - Discover the secrets of lost civilizations - Classic platforming adventure inspired by the games of the 1990â€™s - See if you can beat the challenging speed run mode and become the greatest and fastest adventurer
